entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ChainedConfigurationSource doesn't support reloading manually #58683
  • Determine from Host when HostedServices have completed / stopped working #58675

Closed

  • Assertion failed '(m_firstNode == m_lastNode) || (Contains(m_lastNode))' #58396
    6.0.0
  • [6.0] No build warning from RequiredPreviewFeatures attribute? #58419
    6.0.0
  • WinHttp tests with Tls 1.3 are failing #58587
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow contained indirections in tailcalls on x64 #58686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58682
    area-System.Net
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Zeroinit delay alloc #58677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete duplicate runtime tests #58676
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58658
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Replace S.S.Permissions ref with AccessControl in S.S.C.Xml #58666
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Do Contain analysis after inserting node in block range #58605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58590
    area-System.Net.Http, os-windows, 7.0.0
  • Fix Native Digit Reading #58598
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Building Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch weights to doubles to mitigate rounding inaccuracies and use epsilon when sorting locals #58630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: relax assert in lvaSetDoNotEnregister #58597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • add W11 test queue #58570
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable test parallelization in installer tests #58604
    area-HostModel
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement SinPi, CosPi and TanPi and inverses #53675
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix LDAP StartTLS on Linux #56641
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Validate CompressionLevel in BrotliStream ctor #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use ref local in `MulticastDelegate.TrySetSlot` #56842
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Add support for variance to IDIC #58646
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #58669
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add default value of 0 for EventSource.EventData.Reserved #58671
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Support for ARM32 in NativeAOT #833
  • COM interop support #306
  • NativeAOT: "Undefined instruction was hit" in StartupCodeHelpers.InitializeModules #1499

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Reflection fix - add test and dependency for GetDependenciesDueToAccess #1508
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1507
  • support for Regex.Split in NonBacktracking mode #1506

Merged

  • Rename Runtime.lib to Runtime.WorkstationGC.lib #1505
    area-NativeAOT
  • Fix thread-safety of timeouts in SymbolicRegexMatcher #1490
  • Re-enable nullable reference types for regex #1500
  • Fix nativeaot.sln #1504
    area-NativeAOT
  • Updates to naming in NonBackTracking #1502
  • Update ObjectWriter NuGet #1503
  • lifted all Groups.Tests also to consider NonBacktracking #1501

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Emit ldlen in pattern matching on arrays #56199
  • AV from DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader #56195

PullRequests

Created

  • Support implicit conversions of lambda expressions to LambdaExpression #56200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Fix await completion provider to handle non-"true" local function declarations #56196
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56194
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #56204
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56202
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix doubleclick for Value Tracking #56188
    Area-IDE, Feature - IDE Value Tracking
  • Don't try to rename references in source generated files #56189
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the HasCompilation flag. #56132
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core templates that include both Open API and Authentication should include scaffolding for Swagger to authenticate users. #36185
  • Startup regression: fortunes #36183
  • Cannot programmatically reload configuration at runtime with WebApplicationBuilder #36181
  • Startup regression: single_query #36176
  • ASP.NET Core OIDC/JWT Handlers should not have a direct dependency on the AAD JWT Library #36175
  • Better Support HTTP 303 Status Code #36172
  • Unhandled Exception When Navigating to Authenticated Page Without Being Logged In #36169

Closed

  • ASP.NET CORE CORS #36182
  • Can't run template project: 'The path must be absolute' #36180
  • Perf improvement: mvc #36081
  • Quarantine Failing Linux Tests #34992
    Next sprint planning
  • Quarantine `FileLoggerProcessorTests.WritesToNewFileOnNewInstance` #34986
    Backlog
  • Failing Test `HttpLogging.FileLoggerProcessorTests.WritesToNewFileOnOptionsChange` #34982
    Backlog
  • CanReadAndWriteWithAsyncConnectionMiddleware #34947
    6.0-rc2
  • DATA_Received_TooSlowlyOnSecondStream_AbortsConnectionAfterNonAdditiveRateTimeout #34903
    Next sprint planning
  • Test failure: StreamPool_MultipleStreamsInSequence_PooledStreamReused #34685
    6.0-rc2
  • Analyzer to detect nonconstant sequence number in RenderTreeBuilder calls #14579
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Reuse NegotiateMetadata #36184
  • Add build troubleshooting suggestion #36178
  • Make DataProtection warnings mention aka.ms/dataprotectionwarning #36174
    area-dataprotection
  • Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36171
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi
  • Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36168
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Unquarantine tests #36163
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update selenium version for E2E tests #36173
    7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Avoid using static NullabilityInfoContext #36145
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Add an analyzer that warns about non-literal sequence numbers #35805
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Have kestrel filter out pseudo headers #36166
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] React to dotnet/runtime#57816 #36155
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Internal function parameter type added as entity type on model creation when model contains many-to-many relation #25879
  • `dotnet ef migrations` Invalidates SLN Cache, Resulting a Full Recompile #25878

Closed

  • Obsoleted ToQuery stopped working #24623
    6.0.0
  • Cannot Add Entity with Identity Primary Key when Entity has One to Zero or One relationship via Composite Foreign Key that includes its Primary Key #20570
  • Query: null semantics should apply to GreaterThanOrEqual, LessThanOrEqual, not only strict equality #9544

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25877
  • Fix to #25842 - Cosmos: Translate string.Equals with StringComparison.Ordinal #25875
  • Sort inserts to preserve tracking order on more cases. #25874

Merged

  • Readd test for obsolete ToQuery #25870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25864
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • More links to conceptual docs #25814

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.6-pre20210902144138 #25730
